name: Android Spheres
description:
In this game you are put in an arena to fight an endless wave of robots (robotic spheres), so you must survive as much as you can by picking up better weapons (mini-guns and shotguns) that give you better mobility and let's you deal more damage, you may also need to pick up some health and ammo on the way.

But unlike any other normal game, you don't move by the W, A, S, D keys (there is no walking) but you have to push yourself by using your weapons: when you shoot, the gun propels you backwards. 

More:

For those who stumble across this project:

I put this project on hold until after october (so i can work on a different small project for Halloween, late october), i am only returning after that to work again on this project.

I am planning to change and add some stuff in the future (adding new maps, enemies, destructive props, decorational props, new sounds, music,  change how the enemies behave and navigate, bug fixing and polishing).

*All tho in the settings menu there is a music volume bar, there is no music*
